L1: At the age of just 3, he lost both his eyes in an accident.

L1: Shri Yahaya Sapatvala - a visually impaired teacher will read the  7.10 PM evening regional news bulletin of All India Radio Ahmedabad through Braille Script.

L1: The first such news bulletin was read by Mr Ranchhod Soni- a senior teacher of a school run by Blind People's Association - in 2004, whose name was recorded in Limca Book of world records for reading first live braille news reading on Radio in India.
L2: पहला ऐसा बुलेटिन ब्लाइंड पीपल्स एसोसिएशन द्वारा संचालित एक विद्यालय के वरिष्ठ शिक्षक रणछोड़ सोनी ने 2004 में पढ़ा था।

L1: After some rehearsals, the visually impaired person is reading it live along with a regular news reader.

L1: The aim of this initiative is to spread awareness among society about the plight and cause of people with visual disabilities.
